name: Lil' Artie
description:
Lil' Artie stars a cute little chibi version of myself letting their imagination run wild. They created a bunch of little red monsters to battle. Use Artie's scribble attack to take out the monsters and win the game. But don't let them touch you or it's game over!

I made this game for a class at my college. It's nothing special but I hope you enjoy it.

Use WASD or KEYPAD to move, SPACEBAR to jump and double jump, and F to shoot your scribble attack.
